net.tridentsdk.event

Interface Cancellable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BedExplodeEvent, BlockBreakEvent, BlockBurnEvent, BlockFlowEvent, BlockGrowthEvent, BlockIgniteEvent, BlockPistonEvent, BlockPlaceEvent, BlockRedstoneEvent, BlockSpreadEvent, CreeperLightningStrikeEvent, CropGrowthEvent, EntityBeginExplosionCountdownEvent, EntityBurnByBlockEvent, EntityBurnByEntityEvent, EntityBurnEvent, EntityDamageEntityEvent, EntityDamageEvent, EntityDeathEvent, EntityEvent, EntityExplodeEvent, EntityExtinguishEvent, EntityIgniteEvent, EntityLaunchProjectileEvent, EntityMoveEvent, EntitySaddleEvent, EntityShootArrowEvent, EntitySpawnEvent, EntityTameEvent, EntityTeleportEvent, LightningStrikeEvent, MultiBlockBreakEvent, NotePlayEvent, PigTransformEvent, PistonExtendEvent, PistonRetractEvent, PlayerBucketEmptyEvent, PlayerBucketFillEvent, PlayerChatEvent, PlayerClickItemEvent, PlayerCloseWindowEvent, PlayerConsumeEvent, PlayerDamageEvent, PlayerDeathEvent, PlayerDigEvent, PlayerDropItemEvent, PlayerDropItemEvent, PlayerFamishEvent, PlayerFishEvent, PlayerGameModeChangeEvent, PlayerHungerEvent, PlayerInteractEvent, PlayerJoinEvent, PlayerLaunchProjectileEvent, PlayerLeaveSleepEvent, PlayerMoveEvent, PlayerShearEntityEvent, PlayerShootBowEvent, PlayerSleepEvent, PlayerToggleFlyingEvent, PlayerToggleSprintEvent, RainEvent, SignChangeEvent, SunEvent, ThunderEvent, WeatherEvent

    public interface Cancellable
    An event that implements this supports the ability to cancel (cancel) the event actions and calling behavior
    Since:
    0.3-alpha-DP
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel(boolean cancel) 
      boolean isIgnored() 

    • Method Detail

      • isIgnored

        boolean isIgnored()
        Returns:
        return true if event is set to cancelled

      • cancel

        void cancel(boolean cancel)
        Parameters:
        cancel - set the cancellation state of the event
